ps3.10:4.1: Nicchāto, mokkho vimokkho, vijjāvimutti, adhisīlaṃ, adhicittaṃ, adhipaññā, passaddhi, ñāṇaṃ, dassanaṃ, visuddhi, nekkhammaṃ, nissaraṇaṃ, paviveko, vosaggo, cariyā, jhānavimokkho, bhāvanā, adhiṭṭhānaṃ, jīvitaṃ. #19/19
ps3.10:5.1: Nicchātoti nekkhammena kāmacchandato nicchāto, abyāpādena byāpādato nicchāto … pe … paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇehi nicchāto … pe … arahattamaggena sabbakilesehi nicchāto. #1
ps3.10:6.4: mokkho vimokkho … pe … paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇehi muccatīti—
ps3.10:6.7: mokkho vimokkho … pe … arahattamaggena sabbakilesehi muccatīti—
ps3.10:7.1: Vijjāvimuttīti nekkhammaṃ vijjatīti vijjā, kāmacchandato muccatīti vimutti.
ps3.10:7.4: Abyāpādo vijjatīti vijjā, byāpādato vimuccatīti vimutti.
ps3.10:7.6: vijjāvimutti … pe … arahattamaggo vijjatīti vijjā, sabbakilesehi muccatīti vimutti.
ps3.10:8.1: Adhisīlaṃ adhicittaṃ adhipaññāti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ, saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi, avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi.
ps3.10:8.5: Abyāpādena byāpādaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi … pe … arahattamaggena sabbakilese saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi, avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi.
ps3.10:9.1: Passaddhīti nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ paṭippassambheti, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ paṭippassambheti … pe … arahattamaggena sabbakilese paṭippassambheti. #7
ps3.10:10.1: Ñāṇanti kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhammaṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ;
ps3.10:10.2: byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpādo ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā arahattamaggo ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ. #8
ps3.10:11.1: Dassananti kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhammaṃ diṭṭhattā dassanaṃ.
ps3.10:11.2: Byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpādo diṭṭhattā dassanaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā arahattamaggo diṭṭhattā dassanaṃ. #9
ps3.10:12.2: Byāpādaṃ pajahanto abyāpādena visujjhati … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggena visujjhati. #10
ps3.10:13.3: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, nirodho tassa nekkhammaṃ.
ps3.10:13.5: Thinamiddhassa ālokasaññā nekkhammaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ arahattamaggo nekkhammaṃ. #11
ps3.10:14.3: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, nirodho tassa nissaraṇaṃ.
ps3.10:14.5: Byāpādassa abyāpādo nissaraṇaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ arahattamaggo nissaraṇaṃ. #12
ps3.10:15.1: Pavivekoti kāmacchandassa nekkhammaṃ paviveko … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ arahattamaggo paviveko. #13
ps3.10:17.2: Byāpādaṃ pajahanto abyāpādena carati … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggena carati. #15
ps3.10:19.1: Bhāvanā adhiṭṭhānaṃ jīvitanti kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto nekkhammaṃ bhāvetīti—
ps3.10:19.5: Svāyaṃ evaṃ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno samaṃ jīvati, no visamaṃ;
ps3.10:19.9: Svāyaṃ evaṃ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
ps3.10:19.10: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
ps3.10:19.13: Tathā hi so bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno.
ps3.10:20.26: Svāyaṃ evaṃ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno samaṃ jīvati, no visamaṃ;
ps3.10:20.30: Svāyaṃ evaṃ bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
ps3.10:20.31: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
ps3.10:20.34: Tathā hi so bhāvanāsampanno adhiṭṭhānasampanno ājīvasampannoti. #17–19
